history.proof: intros x y c. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. apply locally_2d_locally. hauto use: Rplus_opp_r, Rabs_R0 unfold: pos, Rminus, locally inv: posreal.

original: intros x y c. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. apply locally_2d_locally. intros u v. rewrite Rabs_right. intros H. apply H.
